definition: surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Chamomile and green tea. Don’t take more than 20mg/day.
sentences.chinese: 甘菊和綠茶，每天不要超過20mg的量。

sentences.english: Almond blossom and floral notes of camomile on a vegetal background.
sentences.chinese: 在植物香氣的背景之上有杏花和甘菊花香。

sentences.english: Make an infusion by boiling and simmering the rhubarb and camomile together.
sentences.chinese: 將大黃和甘菊一起煮沸再用文火燉，熬成湯藥。

sentences.english: And chamomile can help calm you.
sentences.chinese: 甘菊花油則有使人鎮定的功效。

sentences.english: Make an infusion by boiling and simmering the rhubarb and camomile together…
sentences.chinese: 將大黃和甘菊一起煮沸再用文火燉，熬成湯藥。

sentences.english: Osmund chamomile has spread in Nansha zone, more attention would be paid to.
sentences.chinese: 薇甘菊在南沙地區已有蔓延跡象，應引起重視。

sentences.english: We blend that tea by mixing chamomile with pekoe.
sentences.chinese: 我們用甘菊和香紅茶混合調製成那種茶。

sentences.english: K can be developed and utilized as natural plant dyes.
sentences.chinese: 薇甘菊可以作爲天然植物染料開發利用。
有機蘆薈，洋甘菊，金盞草。

sentences.english: Chamomile extract, natural oils and Shea Butter moisturize and nourish the skin.
sentences.chinese: 洋甘菊提取物，天然油和牛油果油滋潤和滋養肌膚。

sentences.english: Certified Organic Rosehip Oil , Chamomile , Carrot , Aloe Vera.
sentences.chinese: 有機玫瑰果油，甘菊，胡蘿蔔，蘆薈。

sentences.english: Factors affecting induction of callus in Mikania micrantha Kunth were studied in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 對影響微甘菊愈傷組織誘導的因素進行了系統研究。

sentences.english: Made with soothing aloe vera and chamomile to detangle and soften damaged hair.
sentences.chinese: 富含蘆薈和洋甘菊精華，呵護受損髮質。

sentences.english: Alternatively, drink a cup of camomile tea or listen to some soothing music.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以喝一杯甘菊茶，或者聽點輕音樂。

sentences.english: A cup of chamomile tea before bedtime may be all you need to relax.
sentences.chinese: 臨睡前一杯甘菊茶可以幫助放鬆精神。

sentences.english: Chamomile was used for highlighting blonde hair nuances.
sentences.chinese: 甘菊曾被用來提亮金色頭髮。

definition: red root gromwell (Lithospermum erythrorhizon)/flowering plant whose roots provide purple dye/arnebia (plant genus in family Boraginaceae)
common mallow (Malva sinesis), used in TCM
a book on Chinese (herbal) medicine/Chinese materia medica
